Constant Field Values

name

private java.lang.String name
name of the document

fileName

private java.lang.String fileName
Complete file name of the doc.

modified

private boolean modified
this flag indicates if the document has been modified since last save. It should be reset to false when saving.

sheets

private java.util.LinkedList<EuclideSheet> sheets
The sheets of the document.

dynamicObjects

private java.util.ArrayList<DynamicObject2D> dynamicObjects
An ordered list of DynamicShape2D, used to update geometry of different EuclideElement.

dependencies

private java.util.HashMap<DynamicObject2D,java.util.Collection> dependencies
to manage dependencies between objects. Instances of Shape2D are used as keys. Each corresponding item is an ArrayList, containing all objects (instances of DynamicShape2D) which depend on the shape given as key. This set contains only shapes with 'children'.

listeners

java.util.ArrayList<EuclideDocListener> listeners

transforms

private java.util.ArrayList<EuclideTransform> transforms
Geometric transformations stored in the document.
